EmailTemplate.name: 201908_EMEAI_GCC_Event_MC.201908_EMEAI_Guests_Reminder_GCC_Event_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: Remember to Register for the EMEAI Global Customer Committee Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> You Are Invited TO OUR GCC event Honeywell’s Regional Global Customer Committee We recently sent you an email to invite you to our EMEAI Global Customer Committee Face to Face Meeting on October 9th and 10th in Berlin. We wanted to take the opportunity to remind you of the invitation and encourage you to register to join us at this exciting event. The Global Customer Committee (GCC) is an independent group of aerospace professionals that works hand in hand with Honeywell to identify and address key issues facing the business aviation community. Here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/EMEAI_F2F_HighLevelAgenda_2019.pdf]]> you will find the High-Level Agenda and a presentation <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/GCC_Presentation_2019.pdf]]> that exemplifies what the GCC is and types of issues that can be addressed at the meeting. To book your place at the GCC Meeting, please be sure to register <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=JuXsln2csEiNr4uTyQpdGNecg6zo2CZDixhcJWIizzpUMzdSS0dLMUVNMlNSSjQzMUhVUEJJSk42Si4u]]> using the button below and call the hotel (details provided below) to book your room. Wyndham Garden Berlin Mitte Please book your room by calling +49 30 495 000 3224 and use the code "GCC Fall 2019" Hotel Address: Osloer Strasse 116 a 116A, 13359 Berlin, Germany Rates per Single Room/Night = EUR 89 including breakfast Rates per Double Room/Night = EUR 99 including breakfast If you have any queries or questions, please feel free to contact us at GCC@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:GCC@Honeywell.com]]>
REGISTER HERE <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=JuXsln2csEiNr4uTyQpdGNecg6zo2CZDixhcJWIizzpUMzdSS0dLMUVNMlNSSjQzMUhVUEJJSk42Si4u]]>
We look forward to meeting you!
João Salgueiro GCC EMEAI Chairman Ghiya Al-Haj-Hasan EMEAI Director, Customer & Product Support
